title: Week 15 Picks, Bill Cowher Interview, Pats-Steelers Game Of The Year (Football 12/15)
description:
Will Brinson, Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora preview and pick Week 15 in the NFL. First, Will and JLC go over the "Scandinavian Death Metal Lock of the Week" and discuss the Titans' woes. Then, CBS on NFL analyst and former Steelers head coach Bill Cowher joins Will to break down the mega-matchup between Pittsburgh and New England this week. Coach Cowher analyzes the game from all angles with his intimate knowledge of the rivalary. Pete and Nick then hop on to make their picks against the spread for Week 15 across the NFL.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
